HTC A9


Back
Device Folder: Z:/HTC/HIA_AERO/

Unlocking

This device is unlocked via XTC2Clip hardware

  1. Insert XTC2Clip into the devices micro SD card slot
  2. Power the device on while holding Volume Up
  3. The device will boot into FTM mode and read the card
  4. When the device reboots the sim lock has been removed

Flash & Debrand

  1. Set the device to S-Off via XTC2Clip
  2. Boot the device into Download mode by holding Volume down & Power
  3. Connect the device to the PC
  4. Run the Flash.bat file from the device folder on the server
  5. The device will now be automatically set to Generic UK CID and will be set to S-On at the end of the flash
  6. Ensure the device is set to S-on and repack

FRP

  1. Insert the XTC2Clip into the devices SD card slot
  2. Boot the device into download mode by holding Volume down & power
  3. Scroll down to FACTORY RESET and select it with Power
  4. FRP has now been removed from the device
